tesla.title: Tesla DashCam Viewer
tesla.desc: Professional dashcam viewer solution for Tesla owners. Visualize all vehicle data with just a USB connection.
features: Real-time visualization of location, speed, and autopilot status
Pedal operation gauge and detailed vehicle information
Up to 6-channel video integration and synthesis
